name: Matriarchs of the Shifting Steps
description: Hailing from Odonaâ€™s Tears, the Matriarchs of the Shifting Steps are known for their obsession with decomposition, be it fungi or poison. Now experienced navigators that captain liquefaction-based transport systems, they look towards the future with a glint in their eye. Their future is bright. The only question: what comes next?
